summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help the federal government save money, address issues on our High Risk List , and significantly improve government operations. This letter to the Federal Reserve outlines 4 open recommendations to prioritize. For example, the Federal Reserve should work with other federal banking regulators to communicate appropriate uses of alternative data sources—such as rent or utility payments—in...
title: Priority Open Recommendations: Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System
